events.name: System Upgrades
events.message: 4DN DCIC will be conducting a database upgrade to the 4DN Data Portal between March 23rd 4:00pm EDT and March 24th 4:00pm EDT. Affected services will include data submission, new account creation, and saving and sharing of HiGlass Displays. The portal may be inaccessible for brief periods during this time.

events.name: System Upgrades
events.message: Data, Staging, and Fourfront systems may be down, unstable, or have data writes suppressed from 4pm EDT Monday, March 23, 2020 through 8pm EDT Tuesday, March 24, 2020.
